segments.text: Tom , this is Mary Bobbins . She ’ s just come over from sales .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s nice to meet you ! Guess we ’ ll be working together .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , she ’ ll be working closely with you on the marketing end of things .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good . Well , welcome aboard , Ms , Robbins .
segments.speaker: S2
